8ball.description: Magic 8-ball. Does exactly what the toy does, memes included.

answers: Doesn't look like anything to me.
I'm being forced to do this, please send help.
I'll pretend I never heard that.
I could tell you but I'd have to permanently ban you.
Do you *really* want me to answer that?
Why would you even think to ask that?
Are you sure you should be asking *me* this?
Maybe, if you take me to dinner first.
If you tell me I'm pretty, maybe you'll find out ;)
I'd answer but I'm having a rough day. Nobody ever asks how I'm doing and it's tiresome.
Yes, no, maybe. I don‚Äôt know.
Does a hat take ten gallons?
We're all going to hell anyway, so yes.
We're all going to hell anyway, so no.
I don't get paid enough for this.
Why do you keep asking me?
Why would you do that? Stop.
Address me as master and then I'll answer you.
If you promise you'll always love me, yes.
If you promise you'll always love me, no.
As long as you're not a jerk about it.
Just as long as you're not a dick about it.
Does a bear shit in the woods?
Does the Pope shit in the woods?
Does a one-legged duck swim in a circle?
Does the Pope shit in his hat?

choice.description: Makes a decision based off of the choices given, no matter how many you include.

responses.tooFew: {{X}} I can't choose for you unless you provide me with at least two choices.

responses.noneSpecified: {{X}} Please specify an emoji you'd like to enlarge.
responses.invalidInput: {{X}} `{{input}}` could not be resolved to a valid emoji (e.g. üó£Ô∏è or {{CHECK}}).

embed.title: RTByte Infomation
embed.description:
[Visit our website at rtbyte.xyz](https://rtbyte.xyz/) 
 
RTByte is an open-source modular multipurpose Discord bot built on the incredible [Sapphire](https://github.com/sapphire-project/framework) framework for [discord.js](https://discord.js.org/).

team.title: Our team
team.content: See our [about us](https://rtbyte.xyz/about/) page for more information.

invite.description: Displays the link to invite RTByte to your server.

embed.title: Invite RTByte
embed.description:
To add RByte to your server, simply click the link below. 
https://rtbyte.xyz/invite/ 
```The above link is generated requesting the minimum permissions required to use every command currently. 

We know not all permissions are right for every server, so don't be afraid to uncheck any of the boxes. If you try to use a command that requires more permissions than the bot is granted, it will let you know.``` 
The RTByte support server can be found using the link below. 
https://rtbyte.xyz/discord/

joindate.description: Displays your account creation date along with the date you joined the current server you're on. Other users can be specified to fetch their info.

responses.notMember: {{X}} `{{input}}` could not be resolved to a member of this server. Please make sure you typed their name or ID correctly, or provide an `@mention`!

quote.description: Quotes a message by ID. Make sure you #mention the channel prior to the message ID if the message you want to quote is not in the same channel you're currently sending the command in.

weather.description: Fetch the current weather for a specified location.

responses.invalidInput: {{X}} `{{input}}` could not be resolved to a location.
